db:info.db:title: RESTful Color Palette Server
db:info.db:titleabbrev: Qt Lightweight HTTP Server Reference Documentation

db:abstract.db:para: Example of how to create a RESTful API server using the QHttpServer.

db:article.db:programlisting:
requires(qtHaveModule(httpserver)) requires(qtHaveModule(gui)) requires(qtHaveModule(concurrent))
TEMPLATE = app
QT += httpserver gui concurrent
SOURCES += \ main.cpp
HEADERS += \ apibehavior.h \ types.h \ utils.h
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/httpserver/colorpalette INSTALLS += target
RESOURCES += \ assets/colors.json \ assets/users.json \ assets/sessions.json \ assets/img/1-image.jpg \ assets/img/2-image.jpg \ assets/img/3-image.jpg \ assets/img/4-image.jpg \ assets/img/5-image.jpg \ assets/img/6-image.jpg \ assets/img/7-image.jpg \ assets/img/8-image.jpg \ assets/img/9-image.jpg \ assets/img/10-image.jpg \ assets/img/11-image.jpg \ assets/img/12-image.jpg
CONFIG += cmdline
